title: Effective Structuring Strategies for Remote Science Classes in Higher Education During the Pandemic Era

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Constructivist-based science lesson design emphasizing asynchronous interaction in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can independently design science inquiry projects based on constructivist pedagogy in online environments
